Title: Silkslug (The Shaw)
Description:
Homage to a game, a game that sold dreams, hopes, but will never come to be.
This slugcat is a joke and i hope it becomes obsolete soon.

The [b]Slug Song[/b] skin is NOT made by me and was NOT made for this slugcat, it is just recommended for a more immersive experience and all credit goes to its creator.

The campaign of this slugcat is the hunter one I believe (I didn't finish it).
The slugcat has been tested in the arena.

Let's move on to abilities.
[list]
    [*]Any spears picked up by this slugcat will automatically be put on its back, this spear can only be removed by [b][DOWN + PICKUP][/b].
    [*]If both slugcats hands are empty you can use [b][THROW][/b] to attack with a slash.
    [*]The slash direction works like a spear throw, and does everything you can expect: damage, pogo (no E Pogo), parry, plus a bit of stun.
    [*]By using [b][JUMP + PICKUP][/b] you can do a dash (with filled hands or not), the dash does the same damage as the slash but cannot parry projectiles.
[/list]
Happy SHAW and GIT GUD.
